title: Angular Universal (SSR)
subject: Angular
theory: Angular Universal renders your application on the server (Node.js) before sending it to the client. This improves SEO (search engines see content immediately) and First Contentful Paint (FCP).

common_mistakes.correction: Node.js doesn't have DOM. Use isPlatformBrowser check or dependency injection for tokens.

interview_questions.question: Why use SSR?
interview_questions.answer: Better SEO, social media previews, and faster perceived load time on slow devices.

real_world_use_cases.description: Google needs to index product descriptions. SSR serves fully rendered HTML.

summary: SSR bridges the gap between SPA interactivity and traditional website SEO.
